EmailTemplate.name: 2-FalconConnect New Inv Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell FalconConnect Invoice - 49Cxxxxx for 4xxxxx - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Please find attached the monthly invoice and call log for your terminal(s). The attached excel version of your invoice contains 3 tabs with specific details of your monthly usage.
If you have questions about your invoice, please e-mail FSSAccounts@honeywell.com or call our Billing Department
US +1 602 365 7020 x6
Thank you for using our services!,
FalconConnect
Account Services
